action.action-desc: Ms. Stefanik (for herself, Mr. Young of Iowa, Mr. Courtney, and Mr. O'Halleran) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize and extend funding for community health centers.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Community Health Investment, Modernization, and Excellence Act of 2017.

section.header: Extension of funding for community health centers
section.text: Paragraph (1) of section 10503(b) of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (42 U.S.C. 254b–2(b)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (D), by striking and at the end;
in subparagraph (E), by striking $3,600,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2015 through 2017; and and inserting $3,600,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2015 through 2018;; and
